categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: According to Kaliyo Djannis, the Cannibal-demon of the Summit was a male Rattataki warlord who rose to power after conquering a numbeer of tribes on Rattatak generations before the Cold War. The warlord's descendants were declared a "cursed family" by other Rattataki, and he had a great-granddaughter named Kaliyo Djannis. However, Djannis was a notorious liar; the veracity of her stories about her family was unconfirmed.
